response.overview: Jacq Vaucan, an insurance agent of ROC robotics corporation, routinely investigates the case of manipulating a robot. What he discovers will have profound consequences for the future of humanity.
response.tagline: Your time is coming to an end – Ours is now beginning
response.title: Automata

titles.title: ล่าจักรกล ยึดอนาคต
